faqs.q: How many calories in a can of Sprite?
faqs.a: A 12 fl oz (355 ml) can of regular Sprite has about 140 calories.
Yes, all 140 calories come from 38 g of carbohydrates (sugars) per can.

faqs.q: Does Sprite have sugar or fat?
faqs.a: Sprite contains 38 g of sugars per 12 oz can and 0 g fat.
